# predicate

**Instance Property**

The predicate that filters samples matching this descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var predicate: NSPredicate? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the predicate is `nil`, the descriptor matches all samples of the data type specified by the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQueryDescriptor/sampleType] property.

## Accessing Descriptor Data

- **sampleType**: The data type of samples that match this descriptor.
